function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate prediction of attack rates compared to observed data","Impact":"Misallocation of public health resources and ineffective intervention strategies","Mitigation":"Use of more accurate predictive models and data-driven simulations","Technologies":"Data analytics, simulation software","People":"Public health officials, government authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unequal roles of individuals in disease spreading based on location","Impact":"Unequal access to public health interventions and resources","Mitigation":"Targeted intervention strategies based on spatial patterns of disease spread","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, targeted vaccination campaigns","People":"Residents of different urban areas","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Variability in efficiency of vaccination campaigns based on location","Impact":"Inequitable distribution of vaccination benefits and potential for outbreak resurgence in underserved areas","Mitigation":"Tailored vaccination strategies based on spatial demographics","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, demographic data analysis","People":"Inhabitants of city center, visitors, suburban residents","Owner":"Public health organizations, government authorities"}]}
